title: Pogalam Lyrics MS Dhoni
stanzas:
idhu thaana antha pon neram
idho boomi ullangai oram
indha nodiyil nee naan podhume

unnodu naanum karaiya
ennodu neeyum karaiya
ondraai kadhalodu pogalaam

naal dhorum sandhipome
namakkaaga jeevipome
innum konja dhooram pogalaam
innum pogalaam

en vaanil naaldhorum minnal
aanal en vaazhkkai un kannil
nee kaatum kan jaadai kandu
thadumaarum nimidangal undu

yedhedho ini nee pesa
viral korthu innum pesu
un vaarthaigalil vaazhgiren

unnodu naanum karaiya
ennodu neeyum karaiya
ondraai kadhalodu pogalaam

naal dhorum sandhipome
namakkaaga jeevipome
innum konja dhooram pogalaam
innum pogalaam

nenjil un sudu moochu theendum
nimisham athu eppothum vendum
yaarum ingillaatha ulagil
irande ven paravaigal naame
naan inge pul veliyaaga
nee vanthaai nun paniyaaga

unnodu naanum karaiya
ennodu neeyum karaiya
ondraai kadhalodu pogalaam

naal dhorum sandhipome
namakkaaga jeevipome
innum konja dhooram pogalaam
innum pogalaam

seo.title: Pogalam Lyrics MS Dhoni
seo.description: Get the complete Pogalam Lyrics MS Dhoni from MS Dhoni. Read the lyrics penned by Pa Vijay and composed by Amaal Malik and sung by Sreeramachandra. Perfect for fans looking for the full Tamil text and song meaning.
seo.keywords: Pa Vijay, MS Dhoni, Amaal Malik, Sreeramachandra, Tamil lyrics, Tamil songs
